name: immigrant_integration_canada_2023
context: A psychometric instrument measuring the subjective integration experiences of recent immigrants to Canada in 2023. This survey captures the multifaceted nature of adapting to Canadian society, moving beyond economic metrics to assess social belonging and cultural navigation. It specifically probes the tension between maintaining heritage culture and adopting Canadian norms, as well as the perceived warmth and receptiveness of the host community.

questions.preprompt: Reflecting on {player_name}'s daily life in Canada, to what extent does {player_name} agree with the following statement:
questions.statement: {player_name} actively tries to participate in Canadian traditions and holidays.

questions.preprompt: Considering {player_name}'s social interactions, how does {player_name} feel about this statement?
questions.statement: {player_name} finds it easy to adopt Canadian social norms and etiquette.

questions.preprompt: Thinking about {player_name}'s cultural identity, please rate agreement with the following:
questions.statement: {player_name} feels uncomfortable speaking English or French in social settings.

questions.preprompt: Regarding {player_name}'s adjustment to life in Canada, indicate agreement with this sentiment:
questions.statement: {player_name} avoids engaging with mainstream Canadian media or news.

questions.preprompt: Thinking about the connection to {player_name}'s country of origin, how much does {player_name} agree with this statement?
questions.statement: It is important for {player_name} to maintain the cultural practices of their home country.

questions.preprompt: Considering {player_name}'s private life and home environment:
questions.statement: {player_name} primarily eats food associated with their heritage culture.

questions.preprompt: When {player_name} thinks about raising a family or future generations in Canada:
questions.statement: {player_name} is worried that their children will lose touch with their ethnic roots.

questions.preprompt: Reflecting on {player_name}'s connection to their roots, rate the following:
questions.statement: {player_name} feels disconnected from the traditions of their home country.

questions.preprompt: Thinking about how {player_name} is treated by others in Canada:
questions.statement: {player_name} often feels like an outsider in Canadian society.
{player_name} feels that Canadians are welcoming and friendly towards them.

questions.preprompt: When {player_name} walks around their neighborhood or workplace:
questions.statement: {player_name} perceives discrimination because of their accent or ethnicity.

questions.preprompt: Reflecting on {player_name}'s sense of belonging in the community:
questions.statement: {player_name} feels accepted as a valuable member of their local community.
